name: Speedric
description:
It is the beta version of Speedric. You can support us by donating a few dollars if you want, but you can of course download this version for free. The next full version will be available soon and it will be free, for anyone willing to support the game, You can pay a small amount of money as a donation when downloading the game.

Socials

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MohandDev

Definitely will start uploading some programming related content on my channel. Stay tuned.
